data.name: TableBorderDistances
desc: contains the distance settings of the border lines of all cells in a cell range.
In a queried structure, the flags in TableBorderDistances::Is...DistanceValid indicate that not all lines of the boxes have the same values.
In a structure which is used for setting, these flags determine if the corresponding distance should be set or if the old value should be kept.

items.name: BottomDistance
lines: contains the distance between the bottom lines and other contents.

items.name: IsBottomDistanceValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder::BottomDistance is used.

items.name: IsLeftDistanceValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder::LeftDistance is used.

items.name: IsRightDistanceValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder::RightDistance is used.

items.name: IsTopDistanceValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder::TopDistance is used.

items.name: LeftDistance
lines: contains the distance between the left lines and other contents.

items.name: RightDistance
lines: contains the distance between the right lines and other contents.

items.name: TopDistance
lines: contains the distance between the top lines and other contents.
